title: 20 Minute queue (from pc crashing in one for all)
body: so i get a 20 min queue for having my computer cash in one for all, good job :) (page_fault_in_nonpaged_area and memory_management) {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/sJMIG0lz-low-priority-ques

this is my discussion about it...riot needs to sort there shit out...and quickly..gonna be losing gamers from it..i tell ya its effected many people.
No one can do anything really about it, just do the queue and watch youtube during the 20 minutes or something
